rules_text:
Reach
[i]Rolf's Bow[/i] – Whenever Rolf, Faithful Student attacks, you may pay {G}{W}. If you do, another target creature you control gets +2/+1 until end of turn.
[i]Younger Brother[/i] – As long as you control a creature with greater mana value than Rolf, he can't be blocked by creatures with mana value 3 or greater.
